vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ῥαάβ
(and Ραχάβ, Mat.1:5; Ραχάβη, -ης, in FlJ), ἡ, indecl. (Heb. רָחָב)
Rahab (LXX, Jos.2:1, al.): Heb.11:31, Jas.2:25.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.2.1;
mother of: Boaz (H1162)(?)
§ Rahab, "spacious, broad"
Rahab, (Proper name) (Jsh. 2; 6:17, 25) Heb. 11:31; Jas. 2:25*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
喇合 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來字的意思是 "寬闊的"
一位在耶利哥的妓女
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
喇合 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来字的意思是 "宽阔的"
一位在耶利哥的妓女
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ra-háp: người kỵ nữ ở thành Giê-ri-cô đã tiếp rước các thám tử của Giô-suê. Xem H7343
